resources.string: There are 3 tiles numbered 1, 2 and 3 and one of them has a burger hidden behind it every time. You have one minute to turn as many tiles as possible by clicking them to find the tiles with hidden burgers.

Each time you turn a tile with a hidden burger, you earn 9 points, and each time you turn a tile with no burger, you lose 3 points. You final score will be based on how many burgers you would have located.
